## deta new

Create a new micro

### Synopsis

Create a new micro

```
deta new [flags] [path]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help             help for new
      --name string      name of the new micro
  -n, --node             create a micro with node runtime
      --project string   project to create the micro under
  -p, --python           create a micro with python runtime
```
